website_summaries.verdict: Touches all the bases that a good home sound system needs to score with movie fans looking for a quality sound experience.
pros: The meaty bass from the included subwoofer really makes this 2.1 audio soundbar
Quick setup, including fast Bluetooth connectivity that allows for audio streaming
cons: Sound output in larger rooms isn’t as robust

customer_reviews.title: BOOMS
customer_reviews.text: Set up took literally 5 minutes. With instant Bluetooth connectivity from the soundbar to the subwoofer, there is nothing hard you have to do besides take it out of the box. The remote is sleek and easy to use, connecting to another device is quick and easy as well. The volume and bass do not disappoint it actually exceeds my expectations. Great buy and great for anyone who needs a boost in their entertainment system.
customer_reviews.author: Gator

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! Great sound and linkage to my Samsung TV
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound from this bar! The remote looks just like the one for my Samsung TV. It linked up great and I love just using one remote control to turn the TV on and the sound bar. So far I have had no issues, easy hookup and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: donaldv9

customer_reviews.title: Simple setup and affordable with great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I admit I’m an idiot when coming to electronic setups but it actually took me more time to unpack this than to setup. Easy instructions make the task simple and quick. It has a variety of sound modes from game to surround sound and for most people with small to moderate sizes rooms will love the sound and the affordability factor.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence Dash

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI-ARC? NOT 200 WATTS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has no HDMI-ARC. I thought it did. Also there is no way this is 200 watts. I have had 40 watt systems that are louder. I will probably keep it but only because I have it in a small room and it works well enough for that. If you have a larger living room I would look else where. This was also cheap compared with others and it meshes good with my Samsung TV. So I give it 3 stars for that but if it is limited.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in this. I expected a kind of surround sound and this is not meant to be a surround sound. The basic sound is good. I don't hear much from the SW. For some reason it was difficult for me to set up. Instructions were not very good. I called for tech help on it and the help was adequate for my needs, I wish I had spent the money and bought a higher quality sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda R. Pyke

customer_reviews.title: If you have a Samsung TV, this is a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Our old speaker system went out, and I was loathe to buy another set of speakers and a receiver and drag wire all over. Instead I got this. Hooked up quickly to my Samsung TV, and I can use the same remote I do with the TV to control it. Pairing to the wireless subwoofer was quick and easy. My only real complaint is that it doesn't support a couple smaller mid-range speakers to allow for a full surround-sound experience. But for the price that would probably be asking too much.
customer_reviews.author: Ewan Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Raised the Bar
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the best way to start this review is to say that after I bought this item so did my friend. The install was so easy! Just plug it in and turn it on, no complicated wiring involved or synchronizing to your tv. No having to follow a bunch of setup prompts. I love the quality of the sound, not that I know the difference except that I can actually hear the bass and everything now!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Martin Fifield

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn’t work AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I have tried new batteries, smacking it, emailed the seller and requested a replacement remote (no reply). I basically have no subwoofer even though the sun says it paired
customer_reviews.author: Supercrossma29

customer_reviews.title: LISTING DOESN'T GIVE ENOUGH INFO
customer_reviews.text: Bought the R450 for my tv. Because this listing is shared with another Samsung soundbar all the reviews and questions stated that this item had an HDMI input. Very upsetting to see that there isn’t one, as my tv doesn’t have an optical outlet. Big waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Soundbar HW R450
customer_reviews.text: Very Best I’ve ever had for a Samsung sound bar! I have Samsung 52 inches tv which I purchased 9 years ago! And this sound bar is my dream come true! It seems they are twins when you play it together😊! As soon as I turn my tv the soundbar turn itself on! Great!! Thank you very much Samsung! I will definitely recommend it to whoever is reading my comment👍👍!
customer_reviews.author: Teresita O. Conti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound bar!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than a home theater system. Super easy to connect to your TV. Not sure about older TVs, but it does have a few con action options. Sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: cld1119

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering another one!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of negative reviews about the sound quality of this system. I ordered anyway and wasn’t disappointed. First I will say I live in a 1083sqft apartment and this system sounds awesome in it. I bought it for my living room television and must say the highs and mid range quality is better than average. The bass is nicely balanced and can get to thumping real nice adjusting the subwoofer power though I have it set at zero which sounds very good. Will be ordering another for the master bedroom!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Che’ Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound for the size.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend for Christmas. They have a Samsung tv so it integrated perfectly. They loved how it sounds! The remote is actually pretty cool but if you have a Samsung tv already, you don’t even need the sound bar remote! (Keep it close by to adjust bass, treble and subwoofer setting though.) Coming from a 5.1 Aperion sound system at my house, there was definitely some sound lacking for me but this product is not for people that are accustom to huge sound. For the price and size, I would say this was a perfect gift for their home theater situation!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: dead in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible product. 1. It completely stopped working without any warning less than an entire months since purchase. AMAZON has already closed the return window. 2. the power plug is atrocious. it is very easy to knock out accidentally. 3. the input plug is very nearly impossible to get standard plugs plugged into it. sum up: it's a terrible design, Samsung's build quality is the worst I have every seen, and Amazon has no doubt noticed this, and made themselves safe from any responsibility. DO NOT BUY SAMSUNG. DO NOT BUY IT FROM AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: eblu

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not great sound bar. Does not have good sound. I replaced my old sound bar that was 4+ yrs old and definitely a downgrade although this one was more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very good bang for the buck! Comes with wall mount brackets also!
customer_reviews.text: I like the choice of connection options..bluetooth, optical, aux, usb. I really was hoping bluetooth wouldn't disconnect every time my Firestick goes in sleep mode or is shut off. I know i can disable the screensaver on the Firestick, but really don't want to leave the unit on 24/7. Overall not a big deal, just need to connect via bluetooth every time. Hooking up via the AUX port, there is a constant noise (static) regardless of the volume level of the sound bar or TV...possibly i have a bad cable. All in all, a good replacement for receiver, speakers, etc etc....takes up way less space and sounds great! Quick and easy setup!
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers, terrible shipping quality
customer_reviews.text: The speakers are great, especially for the price for someone just looking to get a better sound quality than the tv speakers. My only complaint is that when I received this, it was left in my porch on its side with the box completely open. There was obviously tape on the box at one point, but it was pulled to the side and the speakers (in the manufacturer’s packaging) were practically spilling out onto my concrete porch. They didn’t appear to be damaged, but if I lived in a less private neighborhood it probably would have been stolen. This seller should be a lot more careful with the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Heizer

customer_reviews.title: Half-assed improvement to Samsung tv built-in sound
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a piece of crap. If you’re going to use BT connection, it’ll disconnect pretty frequently and you’ll have to go through the tv menu to reconnect. Sound is barely better than the mediocre sound out of my Samsung tv. This might be a decent solution if you use an optical connection to your Samsung tv, but it was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: P. Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 9 Months
customer_reviews.text: This quit working after approximately 9 months of use. Sound quality was adequate but muffled. Sound was more clear and distinct directly from the TV. This unit routinely switched itself off and the volume controls were not always available, somehow hidden. Considering it was connected to a brand new Samsung TV, the compatibility should have been better. I assumed it would last at least a couple years so I didn't purchase the added protection. If you do buy this, purchase the protection. You'll need it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Sounds AH-MAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Video doesn’t do it justice. Whole wall was thumpin’! Super excited for this soundbar for movie nights with my bf. We took a chance after pretty decent reviews! Bought it during the Amazon Prime Day, surprises it came early. Came in a funky looking box but it was safe and sound! Took 20 minutes to set up so very easy! Comes with a sleek remote that let you control the sub and the volume from the bar. Super recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality at this price point!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to this from a mid range Vizio soundbar that quit working after 2 years. HUGE improvement in sound! The bass and higher ranges are good, but I do feel like it's missing a little mid-range, so the depth of sound isn't perfect. However, tbis is great sound quality for the price. Perfect for my roughly 450 sq ft living/dining area. Setup took less than 10 minutes including bringing the box inside and unpacking it. I would definitely recommend this model!
customer_reviews.author: Professor X

customer_reviews.title: My flat screen TV had better sound than this bar.
customer_reviews.text: There is no on-screen display of any functions like volume. The remote is from hell. The bass is nonexistent and the treble control seems to have zero effect on the sound. The volume increments are so small that it requires to go from 31 to 51 to hear a difference in volume on some programs. The display panel on the front is behind a black cloth cover and is about 1/2 inch high and is impossible to read unless standing directly in front of the bar.
customer_reviews.author: inspectorudy

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to install. It works great for what we needed it for. Our TV does not get very loud and my kids love having “dance party’s” in the living room. The sound is ok. But this is compared to the Polk sound bar we previously had. It’s not a bad sound for the money and the sub woofer works great
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung TV and bought this system to use all Samsung products. The remote control for the sound system doesn’t work. Samsung is sending a replacement. They were helpful in giving me help. I’m waiting for the replacement. A bit of a pain to get up and down to adjust the sound with different programs. Haven’t experienced the woofer yet because of the sound limits. The speakers seem to be OK. I’ll know more when I can adjust the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M. Pennell

customer_reviews.title: Better,  it not perfect sound
customer_reviews.text: OK, we were expecting miracles. The very high pitched ceiling of our house, coupled with our advanced age, made it difficult to understand British detective stories on TV. A sound bar seemed to be the solution. It works, works well, but isn't the total solution we had hoped for. what is nice is that it can be Bluetoothed to a laptop for other things, like outdoor music, but the four stars reflect that we still have some difficulty deciphering the accents.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound for slightly hard of hearing, non-techie people.
customer_reviews.text: Provides significantly improved sound quality for a flat screen TV. Easy to install and use for us as slightly hard of hearing, non-techie retired seniors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wasnt pleased
customer_reviews.text: How ever it may be all my stupidity or not reading the small print on installation, I learn that it didn't have a HDMI port , And Optical port was only way to connect and or USB and One other but couldn't operate sounds volume or sound . so i have went to another brand that has HDMI,, and can operate everything with one Remote, I am sure there is a set up way but I don't need to have to take a course in Remote set ups to use a TV sound system,
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was not looking for a room filling, surround sound masterpiece, just a decent solution for sounds for my Samsung TV, this is easy top use, nice and compact and has a good solid sound. Much better option than a Sonos Playbar, which I have in another room, provides a similar solution for a fraction of the cost and don't have to worry about the app glitching.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Russell

customer_reviews.title: you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This system provides room filling punch to any television. As many times as I have seen The Blues Brothers today I noticed so many bass and background sounds I never knew existed in the movie. I have it in my bedroom and when I went to use the master bathroom I could hear this deep booming sound from the movie’s car chase scene into Chicago. This is the sound bar system you want without having to pay a lot of money. Mine is connected to a Samsung N series TV. I’m more than satisfied with this system’s performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sound bar
customer_reviews.text: It's incredible what the engineers have done with sound systems. One formerly had to spend a ton of money and a ton of set up time to get what this bargain unit does easily. From unboxing to set up with TV to pairing with the woofer - I was in business in about five minutes (not counting mounting the brackets to the wall which I decided to do later. I'm thrilled with the sound. I use it primarily for television but also stream music to it - it's just wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Reid

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not much an improvement over the TV sound. At low volumes there is not much difference at all. The remote that comes with the soundbar is fine. The TV remote can control the soundbar sound level, but it does not handle it very well. With the soundbar remote I can change the volume from 50 to 20 in about one second. The TV remote takes about 15 seconds to do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I have the same one in my bedroom, and it's been awesome. My living room is a decent size and I'm big on sound quality. The sound is pretty outrageously good. The bass does fill the whole living room and you can feel it a little in your chest. Its deep and it rumbles. Sure theres other sound bars that are "better" but for the price you arent beating this.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Gearghty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your Samsung Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and turned it on and the woofer set itself up with no effort on my part. My Samsung Smart TV automatically selected the PCM setting when I selected external speakers. The sound is great when you put it on the smart setting it works with the Smart TV to equalize the sound. The only connection the the TV is the digital cable and the DVD's sound great and all my streaming channels come through crystal clear and now I am considering adding the surround sound speakers to complete the package. Couldn't ask for anything better for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Droid Xer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, fast shipping. I only gave 4 stars because it for some reason wont connect via Bluetooth to my brand new Samsung smart tv. Kind of weird you'd think they can sync without having to use the cord...... OH well! Great sound though.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: I don't miss my Bose system.
customer_reviews.text: I don't often leave reviews, but couldn't help it this time. I'm incredibly impressed with this sound bar and sub woofer. For many, many years I had an expensive Bose surround sound system with a huge woofer and Yamaha receiver. Don't get me wrong, it was great, but this little system truly doesn't make me miss it. Sounds incredible, but true. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NKey

customer_reviews.title: The Remote Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great with my tv and works great for a speaker to blast some tunes from my phone. At first I didn’t understand the remote, maybe I should have read the directions.. or maybe not, I won’t ever know. When you push the volume button it will mute which is handy but, if you flip the volume up or down it will adjust the volume past 20. A lot of us were using the directional buttons and that’s why it wasn’t working!!! I think I will be buying the other speakers to go with this sound system because it is beyond amazing quality for the price. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Two0811

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Whoootie whooo, I am listening to TV and music in style now. This changed the entire entertainment experience for me in my home. Looks great. Super easy to install, it basically does it by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Misti Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: the sound was not better then the tv
customer_reviews.text: the sound bar was no help in improving the sound from the tv speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Carleton

customer_reviews.title: Defective unit but even then the sound was just okay
customer_reviews.text: We have a Samsung TV so I was excited about how tight the integration might be. Well, the display didn't work on the soundbar so I had no idea what setting I had. I finally got it to work though without the display. I should also point out the remote didn't work either. The sound quality was okay but I was hoping it would be good enough that voices were easier to understand. They were not. Just generally disappointed. Amazon, however, was great as usual for taking the item back. I'm replacing it with a Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Venkat

customer_reviews.title: look at the Remote!!
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar with sub woofer's quality is decent but the problem is getting it to successfully connect regardless if its plugged right in to the tv. Switching from tv to using your mobile is easy but sometimes that doesn't want to work either. not to mention the remote is abnormal and pretty useless, difficult to understand.
customer_reviews.author: MtheFace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install..........instant results!
customer_reviews.text: The original speaker(s) on my smart TV do not perform at the level I desire. I read the Samsung HW-R450 reviews and decided to give it a try. Very impressive! Took care of my issue instantly. Found the soundbar easy to pair with and found the adjustments (bass/treble) simple to operate. Very satisfied with this purchase. Needless to say, the soundbar arrived on time and in great condition as expected from Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Vigilant

customer_reviews.title: Major upgrade
customer_reviews.text: We never knew what we were missing, but this soundbar has made our TV watching so much more enjoyable. We have a Samsung Smart TV and Roku, and it is all compatible with our Roku remote. Meaning the one remote turns on and off the TV, controls the Roku, and adjusts the volume on the soundbar. Now that is cool!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest part of my audio/video to set up and use. I just plugged the speakers in and the rest was done for you. It was also easy to sync my cable remote to control the speakers as well. I love the sound, much better than the tv speakers, that for some dumb reason they put on the back of the tv!
customer_reviews.author: Fran M. Prisco

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor remote
customer_reviews.text: We really like this sound bar. It is easy to set up and replaces an older version of a Samsung sound bar. Pro: easy set up and small footprint compared to older model Con: no stand for the sound bar and the remote is terrible compared to the old one. My old remote could control both our Samsung tv and sound bar. This one is much more basic and less intuitive
customer_reviews.author: Logan Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound bar sounds fantastic, never has any distortion even at loud levels with bass and the subwoofer turned up even though you’ll most likely never turn the sub up past +1 because it sounds great. Love it, 4 stars because for whatever reason i can’t get it to connect to my tv via digital wire. Could be a problem with the tv but this sound bar is a fantastic deal, would buy again for another room in a heartbeat, i see other sound bars for $600, this was 130 and fills my 2 story house with clean clear sound and thumping clean bass. Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Alex Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic kit for people looking to upgrade for the first time.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first soundbar purchase so I’m not a great reference... but I’m a musician and this set up hits hard in my medium sized living room. The bar clarifies dialogue in movies and the sub makes me feel the action sequence in all formats. Highly recommended for someone who has $200 and wants to have a baller audio experience as alternative to built in flat screen speakers. If you already have surround sound then save your rant for glass slippers and small wallets. For my use... this kit works.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to a 2013 Samsung model TV
customer_reviews.text: So apparently my 2013 model does not have the optical connect or the bluetooth feature...after calling tech support i had to go purchase an extra hdmi cable and an optical to hdmi adapter and it finally worked! Sound is AMAZING, and i love it. only complaint was the issue with my TV, since i am not tech savvy in anyway i had a little anxiety when i couldn't find the matching hole in the back of the tv to connect the soundbar. So make sure your TV has an optical plug or you will have to spend an extra $75ish for an HDMI cable and adapter to make the soundbar work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Digital Audio Port
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, decent soundbar, wound up in garbage because the digital input jack broke it's door, or hinge, or something to where it would no longer accept my digital cord. Be super careful plugging in digital audio. Also the cord to the subwoofer seemed to come out also, but not sure if it was actually broken or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pond

customer_reviews.title: A Very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality system. I have been using it for sometime now. It is connected to the TV source by default and the bass is really nice. Watching movies on TV is so much better. At full volume and bass, my entire floor vibrates. The volume is loud enough for any party you can throw in a 30 x 17 foot room.
customer_reviews.author: Tareen

customer_reviews.title: Do not regret!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sound bar! Every movie and video games feels more immersive than ever. Pretty easy to set up and use. I also use this to play music with bluetooth sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: GrapeslayerTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: R-450 is very good
customer_reviews.text: I Have the R 450 and coming from tv you will see a 100% difference in gaming also in movies and music i played a video game and the room was shaking from the bass sound effects
customer_reviews.author: Sctty569

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little soundbar for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My old Sony soundbar from Walmart broke after many years of use, and I was never all that satisfied with it in the first place. This bar ended up being a great replacement. It's a bit louder than my old one with a lot more bass. It has a readable display in front and has all the options I needed. Well worth the extra $40 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my uncle as a gift after he got a new 65 inch 4K Samsung tv and HE LOVES THIS SOUND BAR and base! Before he’d have to turn the volume up to 40+ to hear at a normal level but after he got this he can hear comfortably at 15-20. It was super easy to install and came in earlier than expected. I did get the warranty as well. Definitely worth the buy and I would highly recommend this to anyone who is looking to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: shummail

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance. Really nothing bad to say considering that i I bought it at a discounted rate due to it being a return or something like that. The only thing that I regret is not just holding out a few weeks more. These went on sale for about the same price and could have had ALL parts and instructions. Including the wall mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: This pair packs some really big and clear sound despite being a lot smaller than I expected. I really love having a wireless sub, it's responsive and I love not having to deal with wires. I have the soundbar mounted on my wall under the TV which was really easy to do. I also love to play audio from my phone over blue tooth, highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Molgaard

customer_reviews.title: held off on rating till now.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give it some time before I reviewed, and now I must say that I'm very impressed. Sound and ease of use is fantastic. Never use integrated speakers again, and honestly don't know if I can ever justify the cost of full surround now either. This is great.
customer_reviews.author: aubieangel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. Crystal clear sound and the subwoofer has deep and rich sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great action sounds
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar hooked up to WiFi just great no problems. I don’t see much difference on conversation but when music or action scenes it really kicks in and I love the depth of sound. However, the woofer does not seem to be very loud.
customer_reviews.author: calbow

customer_reviews.title: Love the rich sound
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the Samsung Sound Bar (R450). The sound is rich, deep, wide. Makes my television seem larger. Highly recommend to anyone in the market for a high-quality sound system that also attached via Bluetooth to mobile devices.
customer_reviews.author: RobbJ86

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs, room 23 x 30 needed more than the TV put out. Easy set up, came with necessary cables.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this is that the things that came with the system to mount on the walls did not even fit the back of the system. And I think it’sa defective one because it always turns on by its self. I literally have to turn it off 3 to 4 .times before it will stay off completely
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Volume lags couple of seconds every time
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely a good speaker however it voice output is couple of seconds behind from TV sometimes and have to switch it off and reconnect and it works fine until the TV is running. Even though settings for subwoofer is set to 0 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Pransh

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: Helped my son mount his 70+ inch QLED Samsung. First disappointment was the sound quality so bingo, great Christmas idea! He loves his new sound bar and I also purchased the surround speakers. Love Samsung products!
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect integration
customer_reviews.text: I live in a condo and found this perfect. I also have a samsung tv. My favorite thing is it integrates perfectly with the same brand tv so setup was extremely simple. No programming remotes or anything. Sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar make a world of difference ..great bass..tones down on commercials ..makes movies sound real.. easy to hook up..like being able to blue tooth my phone through it play Pandora sound like a great stereo
customer_reviews.author: james Heil

customer_reviews.title: very modest unit at best
customer_reviews.text: bought this because i bought a samsung 4k tv and it was recommended by installer.. i still can't get the subwoofer to connect to the soundbar. you're better off getter a better soundbar w/o the subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: amazonia

customer_reviews.title: When you want to hear things...
customer_reviews.text: Samsung hasn’t been contacted for this product. I’ve had good dealings with them in the past. Not super impressed with the sound quality. But it does play sounds and adds deeper base than the TV on its own. Paired with wireless rear speakers and they are a bit of a let down as it turns out as well. Didn’t want to drop a ton of cash on a surround system. This will do just fine. Just wont impress anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Very lucky purchase 😏
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation with Samsung tv. Nice enhancement especially for musical programs. Arrived promptly in perfect condition. Very lucky addition. It inspired our kids to give us 65" tv - also Samsung. May all purchasers be so lucky but can’t guarantee it 😋
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Girl

customer_reviews.title: Ya, I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I can clearly hear over the AC in my downstairs man cave ...
